pageContext.claim: “You know, originally, people were talking about $20 [billion] to $25 billion [as the cost for a border wall]. You don't have to spend that much; it's not nearly that much. We've cut it down -- I've actually gotten a better wall for much less money.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump did not find savings or a cheaper way to build his promised concrete border wall, which would cost at least $25 billion. He now supports building and replacing fences along parts of the border, which is less expensive.
